title: "Intelligently search Adobe Experience Manager content using Amazon Kendra"
excerpt: "This post shows you how to configure the Amazon Kendra AEM connector to index your content and search your AEM assets and pages. The connector also ingests the access control list (ACL) information for each document. The ACL information is used to show search results filtered by what a user has access"
